label: SearchIndexerDataSource
description: Represents a datasource definition, which can be used to configure an indexer.

fields.label: Type
fields.tooltip: Defines the type of a datasource.

fields.label: Sub Type
fields.tooltip: A specific type of the data source, in case the resource is capable of different modalities (for example, 'MongoDb' for certain 'cosmosDb' accounts).

fields.label: Container
fields.tooltip: The data container for the datasource.

fields.label: Identity
fields.tooltip: An explicit managed identity to use for this datasource.

fields.label: Encryption Key
fields.tooltip: A description of an encryption key that you create in Azure Key Vault.

fields.label: Data Change Detection Policy
fields.tooltip: The data change detection policy for the datasource.

fields.label: Data Deletion Detection Policy
fields.tooltip: The data deletion detection policy for the datasource.

fields.label: Indexer Permission Options
fields.tooltip: Ingestion options with various types of permission data.
